name: Niactyl Panel
description: Runs the Niactyl panel with automatic git updates

installation.script:
apt update && apt install -y git
cd /mnt/server
if [ ! -d .git ]; then git clone {{REPO_URL}} .; fi
npm install --omit=dev
npm run build > /dev/null 2>&1 || true

variables.name: Git Repository URL
variables.description: Repository to clone for the panel

variables.name: Git Branch
variables.description: Branch to use when pulling updates
